not_configured_yet: Sistimi ha e so lokisoe. Wizate ena ea ho seta e tla u thusa ho ntlafatsa sistimi ea hau le ho sebetsa ka mehato e seng mekae.
system_config_start_with_base_and_backup: Khutlisa ho tsoa faeleng ea bekapo
system_config_include_demo: Kenyelletsa demo e nang le ts'ebetso e etsisitsoeng ea sesebelisoa
dashboard_from_group: Theha dashboard ho tsoa sehlopheng sena
cronwizard_minuteselect_everyminute: Motsotso o mong le o mong
cronwizard_minuteselect_everynthminute: Metsotso e meng le e meng <n>
cronwizard_hourselect_everynthhour: Lihora tse ling le tse ling tse <n>
cronwizard_schedule_set_slot_end:
E qala ka {{start}}.
Beha pheletso ea nako.
cronwizard_bindings_define_types_and_mod: Hlalosa mefuta le limmojule tse ipapisitseng le kemiso ena (ka boikhethelo)
cronwizard_action_set_action_to_execute: Beha ketso eo u ka e etsang ho latela liketsahalo tsa ketsahalo ena
cronwizard_action_schedule_variable_hint: Sebelisa @{{name}} joalo ka mokhoa oa ho feto-fetoha ha mantsoe a cron kapa sebelisa Scheduler.IsScheduling("@{{name}}). ") mananeong a boiketsetso ho bua ka ketsahalo ena.
enable_to_run_program: Sebetsa lenaneo e le hore e sebetse
main_code_empty_note:
Khoutu ea "Moholo" ha e na letho.

Sebelisa "Visual code" ho hlahisa khoutu ena:
- Bula sehlopha "Lenaneo" ho tsoa phaleteng ea litaelo ka letsohong le letšehali
- Hula mofuta oa "Main" sebakeng sa ts'ebetso sa khoutu ea pono
- Eketsa ka hare ho eona li-blocks tse ling ho kenya tšebetsong liketso le mabaka a lenaneo lena

Lenaneo "Main" le ka tsamaisoa ka letsoho kapa la qala ka boiketsetso ho latela maemo a tla qetella a fanoe ka khoutu ea Setup.
setup_code_empty_note:
"Setapo" khoutu ha e na letho.

Sebelisa "Visual code" ho hlahisa khoutu ena:
- Bula sehlopha "Lenaneo" ho tsoa phaleteng ea litaelo ka letsohong le letšehali
- Hula mofuta oa "Setup" sebakeng sa ts'ebetso sa khoutu ea pono
- Eketsa ka hare ho eona li-blocks tse ling ho fumana maemo a tla etsa hore "Main" a etsoe ka khoutu

Khoutu ena e hlahlojoa nako le nako ha ketsahalo e ncha e etsahala mme bonyane hang ka motsotso.
capture_commands_description: Kenya litaelo tsohle tse etsoang ka letsoho ho li-widget lenaneong.
capture_pause_asis: Joalo ka ha ho le joalo

16.Title: Memori ea Boemo
16.Description: Boloka 'me u hopole boemo ba ho qetela ba dimmer.
16.HomeGenie.LevelMemory: Hopola boemo ba lebone la ho qetela ha o butswe

34.Title: Boemo ba Leholimo
34.Description:
Lintlha tsa boemo ba leholimo le bolepi ba leholimo ho tsoa ts'ebeletso ea Open Weather Map.
Ho kenya sesebelisoa sena, kenya konopo e nepahetseng ea API.
Latela litaelo ho https://openweathermap.org/appid ho fumana senotlolo sa mahala sa API.

78.Title: Smart Thermostat
78.Description: Sebelisa sensor efe kapa efe ea mocheso le sesebelisoa se bohlale ho kenya tšebetsong tšebetso ea thermostat.

81.Title: Mohlokomeli oa Matla
81.Description: Hlahisa lipalo-palo tsa tšebeliso ea matla le tšebeliso ea lisebelisoa.

82.Title: Mokhoa oa ho boloka matla
82.Description: Boloka boemo ba khanya bo ka tlase ho peresente e ka lokisehang.

90.Title: Tshireletso Alarm System
90.Description: Sebelisa li-sensor le lisebelisoa tse ling ho kenya tšebetsong alamo ea ts'ireletso.
90.HomeGenie.SecuritySensor: Sebelisa e le sensor ea tšireletso
90.ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients: Lenane le arohaneng la likoma la ba amohelang mangolo-tsoibila bakeng sa litsebiso tsa alamo
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.ArmedProgram: Lenaneo la ho matha ha o hlometse
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.DisarmedProgram: Lenaneo la ho sebetsa ha o tlositsoe lihlomo
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.TriggeredProgra: Lenaneo le tla sebetsa ha le hlohlelletsoa

400.Title: Demo ea Virtual Modules
400.Description: Seta ka bouena boleng ba sesebelisoa sa sebele.
400.Sensor.DoorWindow: Boemo ba sensor ea mamati / fensetere (e butsoe / e koetsoe)

401.Title: Demo - Toggle Door
401.Description: E etsisa lemati le bulehileng / le koetsoeng la sensor ea fensetere ea mamati.

402.Title: Moemo - Motsamao o Fumaneha
402.Description: E etsisa tlhahlobo ea motsamao oa li-sensor tse ngata tsa demo.

410.Title: Simulator ea sensor
410.Description: Hlahisa litekanyetso tsa sensor tse sa reroang.

505.Title: Remote Control
505.Description: Laola sesebelisoa u sebelisa remote (IR kapa RF).

145.Title: Sesebelisoa sa Smart
145.Description: Bulela/tima sesebelisoa ho ipapisitsoe le ho lemoha motsamao le leseli le tikolohong.
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.CheckLuminosity: E laoloa ke sensor ea leseli (ho ikhethela)
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.SwitchOffTimeout: Koala ka mor'a nako ea ho se sebetse (metsotsoana)
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.MinLuminance: Bulela haeba leseli le ka tlase:

8.Title: Mebala ea ho chaba ha Letsatsi
8.Description: Mohlala "ho chaba ha letsatsi" bakeng sa mabone a LED a fetolang mebala.
8.Scenarios.SunriseColors: Khokahano le boemo ba Mebala e Hlabosang
